title: False Season End Date
body: Well done rito, said end of season was on 19th at 7pm in the patch notes but ended it at midnight on 18th. I was g1 going to plat and now this :p was looking forward to playing a whole day of league tomorrow to rank up and now this. Anyone else annoyed? Rito if you are going to say one thing and then do another please actually say it or ANNOUNCE it. Another gold season :p yay

replies.body:
No this is not fair riot.
i am a miserable hard stuck player,
having no prospect in irl
i have made it my project and a lowly dream to reach Diamond this season
currently at P1 70 lp and will get dia before 7pm today
you cant just do this without announcement 
please do something about this
:/ :\ :/ :\
